Detailed Description

Efficient eValue list class.

This class is able to store an ordered list of eValues of different types, including nested lists, and to transmit it using YARP.

The main difference between this implementation and the YARP default one is that this is not strictly human readable, which permits a faster and more efficient memory copy and yarp transmission.

Furthermore, using the efficient copy operator, most of the memory leaks that pointers may cause are avoided.

void eBottle::append ( const eBottle &  yb  ) 

Inserts all the values inside a given eBottle at the end of the eBottle. The given eBottle is not inserted as a nested eBottle.

Parameters:
[in] yb The eBottle whose eValues will be appended

References count(), and getPtr().

Creates a binary representation of the eBottle

Parameters:
